definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 并且对于易受伤害患者予以优先照顾和妥善保护。

sentences.english: Like all drugs，Miacalcic should be kept out of reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 与其他药物一样，密钙息应妥善保存，勿让儿童接触。

sentences.english: Their radar system are better located and we have better radars.
sentences.chinese: 俄方的雷达系统被妥善的安配，我们有更先进的雷达。

sentences.english: Broken glass and pipettes are "sharps". Dispose of them correctly too.
sentences.chinese: 弃置大件玻璃利器时，请通知当值职员协助妥善处理。

sentences.english: I dovetailed my work arrangements with hers.
sentences.chinese: 我把自己的工作和她的工作做了妥善安排。

sentences.english: We should seek common ground and properly handle differences.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求同存异，妥善处理分歧。

sentences.english: A procedure for properly fitting the diaphragm is described.
sentences.chinese: 阿妥善程序拟合膜片描述。

sentences.english: At present, the Public Security Bureau has been sounding instrument for proper disposal.
sentences.chinese: 目前，该探空仪已由公安分局妥善处置。

sentences.english: We will handle these payments as soon as we receive the L/ Cs .
sentences.chinese: 一旦信用证寄过来，我们将会妥善处理好这些付款。

sentences.english: Third, we need to conduct equal-footed dialogue to properly handle our differences.
sentences.chinese: 三要开展平等对话，妥善处理分歧。

sentences.english: If you have tried a properly brewed one, you must have noticed it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你曾试图妥善自酿一，你一定看得到。

sentences.english: Make sure you have appropriate insurance.
sentences.chinese: 确保你拥有妥善的保险。

sentences.english: She is good at smoothing these little problems out.
sentences.chinese: 她善于妥善解决这一类小问题。

sentences.english: Safekeeping of all departments to be accurate staff scheduling table.
sentences.chinese: 各部门需妥善保管准确的员工排班表。

sentences.english: Believe that in the near future, the issue of lightning protection of wind power can be properly addressed.
sentences.chinese: 相信不久的将来，风电防雷的问题能得到妥善解决。

sentences.english: It all comes down to drawing shapes, selecting and shading them properly.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都归结到绘图形状，妥善选择和底纹。

definition: to deal with the aftermath (arising from an accident)/funeral arrangements/reparations
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/to get into bed/placement
to handle/to take care of/to punish
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
countermeasure for dealing with a situation
to hold in safekeeping/to have in one's care/to guarantee/certainly/surely/custodian/curator
at the earliest possible time/as soon as possible
to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
to save from damage/to preserve/to maintain/to keep in good repair/(Tw) security guard
